review: Google has made it easier for me to watch TV shows, listen to music, play games, etc! I use my chromecast at parties when i want to get on pandora and play some music or even show some pictures on the big screen. At a reasonable price, you can have one connected to every TV in your home and make it easier for you to watch your shows. This is a device that i would keep in my pocket just in case boredom strikes.. Very useful gadget when missing your laptop. Just find a TV, make sure you have Wifi connection, and a device that has the Google chromecast App and you are ready to go!ENJOY!!!

author: JC

review: I bought this for a relatively new large flat screen with multiple HDMI outlets.  I followed the sparse instructions and the TV didn't recognize that it was plugged into an HDMI port.  I put it away for a few months and t hen spent an hour or so trying various configurations, but same result There are NO helpful FAQs or manuals, so I emailed  Google support a week ago -- serial number, problem in detail.  Maybe you got a response; I didn't.  I'll try to return it but it's probably too late.  I understand that gadgets sometimes don't work, but the lack of Google support for a product bearing  their name is shocking.
